messages.subject: Sharing a Smiley moment
messages.msgSnippet: Hiya all!  My 6yr old son is into dinos big time.  More to the  point Dino bones.  Today was a nicer day here in IL so he went out to  play!  Was digging in
messages.messageBody:
Hiya all! My 6yr old son is into dinos big time. More to the point Dino
bones. Today was a nicer day here in IL so he went out to play! Was digging
in the yard for bones (daddy wasn't so much thinking this was a good idea but
shh daddy wasn't home). After about an hr doing this he comes running into
the house SO EXCITED he had found some bones (Holy Crap eww mom was thinking
cause im pretty sure it was the jaw of a kitty) anyhow he pulls out all his
books and flys through them to find out what kind they are. Moms vote is for
a plant eating flying kind. Jacob on the other hand is convinced he has
discovered Trex bones. This was just so exciting to me as the middle of last yr
when we pulled him out of school he was so traumatizes (teacher had labeled
the 2 jacobs the good jacob and the bad jacob... my amazingly energitic baby
was the bad jacob) that I feared hed ever be excited like this again!! So
today was a good day!!

Chrissy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
